title: MD
biography: Frederik Barkhof is a neuroradiologist. He led the development of the Barkhof Criteria for using MRI findings to predict conversion to clinically definite multiple sclerosis.
aiSummary: Frederik Barkhof is a neuroradiology specialist with an H-index of 178 at University College London (Faculty). Has been published in The Lancet Neurology, Proceedings of the National Academy of Sciences, New England Journal of Medicine. Based in United Kingdom.
